DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3000 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
